OOC: 16 feet is the current size limit, and the gestelts we had were
from 30 to 50 feet tall. What could happen is that Wheeljack builds
her old form on top of her current one, making her smaller but legal
in size.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Stacy <EmprzAnastazia@a...>"
<EmprzAnastazia@a...> wrote:
> 
> > OOC: Uh, that's an issue for the council to decide.  There's a rule 
> > against making your chars too big.  Anyway, average G1 size is 
> closer 
> > to 20 feet tall than 40.  You're talking about a character nearly 
> the 
> > size of some gestalts.
> >
> Umm.. Not from the stats that I know. Raksha's site even has a pretty 
> good set up of sizes. Megatron himself is 39 feet in height. 
> BMs are half the size of Gen 1.
> I'm trying to get Maxima to revert back to her Gen 1 style. 
 to rebuilt my old form, correct?"
